messages.subject: Saito Dosan
messages.msgSnippet: To whom it may concern, Hello. I am looking for general information about a daimyo by the name of Saito Dosan. Any general information would help. I also am
messages.messageBody:
To whom it may concern,

Hello. I am looking for general information about a daimyo by the
name of Saito Dosan. Any general information would help. I also am
hoping to find out more about his relationship with Oda Nobunaga.

Doomo arigatoo gozaimasu.

Jeff M.
